Module uno_game

Package gui

package gui
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CPUPanel
    CPUPanel is a custom JPanel that represents a CPU player's hand and status in the game.
    InfoPanel
    InfoPanel is a custom JPanel that displays game information such as error messages, status messages, the number of remaining cards, and the current direction of play.
    LeaderBoardWithStats
    LeaderBoard_stats is a JFrame that displays the leaderboard of users.
    LoginPage
    LoginPage is a JFrame that provides the login interface for users.
    MainFrame
    The MainFrame class represents the main window of the application.
    MainMenu
     
    PlayerPanel
    The PlayerPanel class represents the panel for the human player, displaying the player's cards and control buttons (Draw and Say UNO).
    ResultWindow
     
    Session
    The Session class represents the main game session panel for the UNO game.
    SignUpPage
    The SignUpPage class provides the GUI for the user registration.
    TablePanel
    The TablePanel class represents the game table panel in the UNO game.
    UserCellRenderer
    The UserCellRenderer class customizes the rendering of UserInfo objects in a JList.
    UserStats
    The UserStats class represents a window that displays statistics for a specific user.
    UserStatsDialog
    The UserStatsDialog class displays a dialog box with statistics for a specified user.
    ViewCard
    The ViewCard class represents a visual component for displaying a card in a card game.
